#### BASE(_ = 'base_ )
Base whisper version.


#### LARGE(_ = 'large_ )
Biggest whisper version.


#### MEDIUM(_ = 'medium_ )
Larger then Base whisper version.


#### SMALL(_ = 'small_ )
Second smallest whisper version.


#### TINY(_ = 'tiny_ )
Smallest whisper version.
